meta.title: Personalizer
meta.description: The development of a proof-of-concept personalizer that takes unauthenticated data and provides a sorted list of related links to Service Canada Benefits.

howToText: To see how these services would be different if you were to arrive from a different province, time of year, or in a different language, change the above settings and click refresh
